title: Daily Push
subtitle: From 0 to 100 Push-Ups
hero: From 0 to 100 push-ups — a progressive training program that builds strength step by step. Easy tracking and dark mode for late-night sessions.

features.progDesc: Customized difficulty that adapts to your level.
features.trackingDesc: Log sets, rest times and progress in seconds.
features.darkModeDesc: Comfortable for early mornings or late-night training.

downloadDesc: Download Daily Push and start your journey from 0 to 100 push-ups.
supportDescription: If you have any questions, issues, or feedback, please contact us.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.collectedIntro: We only collect the data necessary for the app to function, for example:
privacyPage.collectedList:
• Account information (email, id).
• Training data (e.g. number of repetitions).
• Subscription-related data (managed by Apple/Google).
privacyPage.usageText: Data is used to provide and improve the app, track your progress and manage your subscription.
privacyPage.sharingText: We do not sell your data. Providers (hosting, limited analytics) may access data necessary for the service.
privacyPage.rightsText: You can request deletion or export of your data at any time by contacting us.
privacyPage.intro1: For privacy inquiries, reach out by email.
privacyPage.intro2: Your privacy matters. This page explains what we collect and how we use it.
privacyPage.requestDel: To request deletion or export, contact us at:

termsPage.title: Terms of Use
termsPage.section1Text: The app provides programs and tracking tools for your workouts (push-ups, etc.).
termsPage.section2Text: For personal use only. Do not redistribute content. Advice does not replace medical advice.
termsPage.section3Text: Some features are available via subscription. Payments are handled by Apple / Google. Check cancellation terms on your store.
termsPage.section4Text: The publisher is not liable for any injury related to use. Practice responsibly.
